obr.content: I participated in the OBR (Olimpíada Brasileira de Robótica). The goal of the competition was to develop autonomous robots and complete the applied challenges.

internship.content_1: I enrolled in an intership in
internship.content_2: . During those 3 months, I was able to learn much about instrumentation, by fixing devices such as manometers and programming in the Delta-V software.

obr_2.content: I participated in the OBR for a second time, but now for a theorical test. The goal was to answer questions about robotics in general, and fortunately I was able to achive a high rank, which granted me a gold medal.

igti.content: I finished my first full stack web course, in the IGTI institute. This is where all my passion for web development started. Here I learned the web fundamentals, but already managed to create some applications.

asimov.content_1: I participed in the ASiMov project, which allowed me to experience how the base os robotics was, back in the day. Our goal was to build autonomous robots pretty much from scratch, by using 3D design softwares (such as
asimov.content_2: ) and Arduino/ESP 32 boards with C++ language.

gostack.content_1: Now is when things started to get intense, regarding to web development. For my 19th anniversary, I asked my father to gift me with a longer web development course.
gostack.content_3: , and since then I have not lost a single oportunity to learn with them. This time, I learned not only to develop simple applications, but also complex systems and how to deploy them all.

tcc.content_1: Since my highschool degree is also for Automation Technician, I had to produce a final paper.
tcc.content_2: I got together with two mates to do so,
tcc.content_4: . Our project consisted in a LiDAR sensor, which scans small ambients in 2D.
tcc.content_5: In order to visualize the data collected by the sensor, a graph software was build. In a nutshell, the interface was a website built with react, whose function was to receive the current data and plot it as a radar graph.

bytejr.content_1: I started a new position on
bytejr.content_2: , as a full stack developer. During the time I`ve spent there, I`ve worked with React (front-end) and nodeJS + postgres (back-end).

dowhile.content_1: I participated in a tech event, hosted by
dowhile.content_2: . During days 1 and 2, I was able to watch speeches about programming languages, new methodologies, and get in touch with new people.
dowhile.content_3: Probably the strongest thing about this event was to comprehend how huge, diverse and united our tech ecosystem is.

itec.content_1: I had the pleasure of being applied to an university scholarship. The project was organized by
itec.content_2: , a computer science center. There, I have been given the oportunity to work alongside
itec.content_3: , by improving their web site and developing a mobile app, that monitures agricultural data.
